title: LAGSHIAN Women's Elegant One Shoulder Ruched Asymmetric Ruffle Satin Cocktail Party Maxi Dress
description: Features: Elegant one shoulder design, adjustable back strap detail, gorgeous ruffled hem, waist ruched design, sleeveless design, asymmetrical hem, showcasing a noble and elegant temperament.
Material: Fashionable satin cocktail dress, high quality, lightweight and soft, comfortable, smooth and glossy, skin friendly, durable, natural breathable ultra thin fabric.

Occasion: This silky and elegant cocktail long dress can appear in various formal occasions, such as wedding guests, prom, birthdays, cocktail party, dinners, red carpets, anniversaries, banquets, graduation ceremonies, and romantic dates etc. You can wear it in spring, summer, autumn, and winter.

Matching: This satin bodycon party dress is very dazzling in the light. You can pair it with gemstone earrings, pearl necklaces, bracelets, and high heels to make your overall look more gorgeous and charming.
SIZE: Small=(US 4-6), Medium=(US 8-10), Large=(US 12-14), X-Large=(US 16-18). Machine washable in delicate cycle with laundry bag in cold water. Hang dry in the shade.

LAGSHIAN is Committed to women's wear, we have a professional design team and factory." "Quality first, reputation first, customer first is our business philosophy."
